explanation: [0-0] Against a black background, a left hand holds a blue cloth bag, with an orange object behind the hand.

[0-2] The camera pulls back to reveal the right hand untying the string tied around the bag. Behind the blue cloth bag is a large pumpkin. Then, the right hand takes a samurai sword out of the bag. The left hand pulls down the bag on the sword, the left hand grabs the scabbard, the right hand grabs the hilt, and pulls the sword out, turning the blade downward.
